nodes.text: Point Vigilance was one of the Six Claws, spits of land at the western coast of the continent of Alanciar on the planet Kesh. As such, Point Vigilance jutted westerward into the Western Sea toward the continent of Keshtah. The Alanciari, Keshiri inhabitants of Alanciar, maintained a signal tower at Point Vigilance from which the Signal Corps could watch for signs of invasion from the Lost Tribe of Sith, who inhabited the western continent. The fortress of Garrow's Neck lay inland from the Six Claws an housed a garrison of soldiers who could respond in the event of such an attack.
